data.title: Digital Fingerprint Extraction
content: Implemented a mobile fingerprint recognition system using OpenCV and SIFT for accurate identity verification.
Developed a FLANN-based feature matching pipeline that enabled real-time database comparisons.
Delivered a Flask-based web interface for seamless user access, improving authentication speed and reliability.

data.title: Infrastructure Approval System
content: Automated Khelo India infrastructure approvals with a Flask-powered workflow platform.
Built REST APIs and real-time dashboards, increasing transparency and reducing manual tracking errors.
Implemented role-based authentication and SQLite storage, streamlining project validation for officials.

data.title: Voyager
content: Developed a context-aware travel chatbot integrating booking, restaurant, and emergency services.
Applied NLP intent classification and smart filters for accurate, real-time recommendations.
Optimized asynchronous backend in Flask, reducing response latency and improving user engagement.

data.title: Democratic Desk
content: Built a full-stack MERN platform for voter engagement, slot booking, and polling information.
Implemented JWT authentication and MongoDB storage, ensuring secure, persistent user data.
Enabled location-based services and demos for first-time voters, increasing civic participation awareness.

data.title: Ecoledger
content: Created a decentralized carbon tracking dApp using Solidity smart contracts.
Integrated NextJS frontend with MongoDB backend for off-chain data and Web3.js wallet interactions.
Promoted transparent carbon credit trading, encouraging active sustainability participation.

data.title: Xplore
content: Developed a personalized adventure planner using Flask and collaborative filtering algorithms.
Processed location and weather data to provide context-aware real-time activity suggestions.
Delivered a JavaScript frontend with dynamic recommendations, enhancing user experience for outdoor enthusiasts.

data.title: Audio Emailr
content: Built a voice-driven email client integrating Gmail, Zoho, and Outlook APIs.
Enabled hands-free email management using Google Speech-to-Text and Text-to-Speech APIs.
Stored user preferences and command history in MongoDB, improving accessibility and usability.

data.title: Study Buddy â€“ Alexa Skill
content: Developed a Python-based Alexa skill to upload and query study notes from PDFs via voice commands.
Built a RAG pipeline using Sentence Transformers and ChromaDB, with metadata stored in DynamoDB.
Designed a fully serverless backend using AWS Lambda, S3 (pre-signed URLs), SES, and CloudWatch.
